author: kilasuit
body: It looks like that Repo doesnt have the CLA process enabled right now - or is that just me?

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: @kilasuit , can you point to a PR with an issue?

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body:
It looks like it is working to me:
![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/10873629/17789049/52ee38da-6545-11e6-9560-b88e2a3c8838.png)

comments.author: kilasuit
comments.body: May have been just because I was looking at an old tab open with older PR's from before the Repo went l public like these below You'll see these don't have the CLA label added at all but that is expected behaviour isnt it?

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: Yes, that is expected issue unless you close and reopen the issue.  I'll close the issue if you agree?

comments.author: kilasuit
comments.body: @TravisEz13 - That makes sense & will know for next time :wink:

title: Doesnt look like CLA process is enabled?
